name: AutobaytSmartHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Autobayt Smart Home can control your smart switches via voice command and added routines.

Users are required to login to their Autobayt accounts in order to use Autobayt Smart Home skill and must have been added at least one smart device.

If you are new to Autobayt, follow these steps before using this skill:
1) Download the Autobayt App from App store or google play store.
2) Create new account and login.
3) Add one or more smart switches to your account and specify a clear name for each device like "My lights", "Bed lights"
4) Now you can add this skill and link your new account with Alexa
